Salmon with Sesame Oil

Ingredients
  • 500g/1lb salmon
  • 4tbsp sesame seeds
  • 150 ml sesame oil
  • Japanese soy sauce
To serve:
  • Japanese soy sauce
  • Salad made from:
  • pickled ginger
  • beanthread noodles (soaked in boiling water for 5 minutes)
  • coriander chopped, mint chopped.
Method

  1. Wrap the salmon in cling film and chill for a couple of hours.</p>

  2. Slice the salmon as thinly as possible, cutting the flesh on a diagonal, and arrange on a plate in a fan pattern.</p>

  3. Heat the sesame oil in a pan until sizzling hot and smoking. Carefully spoon the oil over the salmon and serve with the salad piled into the centre of the plate and a bowl of soy sauce to dip the salmon pieces into.

Published: July 22 2012
